name: Tomato Soup
description: A warm, flavorful bowl of ramen with rich broth and tender noodles, perfect for cozying up on a rainy day. Comes with boiled egg and pork.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Comforting chicken soup with carrots, celery, and herbs in a savory broth, ideal for a rainy evening. Served with a slice of sourdough bread.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Hearty beef stew with chunks of tender beef, potatoes, and carrots in a thick gravy. The perfect warm meal to enjoy during a rainy afternoon.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: Fresh tomato and basil soup with a touch of cream, perfect for staying warm during rainy days. Pairs beautifully with our grilled cheese sandwich.

name: Vegetable Stir-fry
description: A colorful blend of stir-fried vegetables in a savory soy sauce, served over jasmine rice. Light and healthy, perfect for a rainy evening.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy mushroom risotto made with arborio rice and parmesan cheese. Ideal for a cozy, rainy evening. Rich, earthy flavors complement the weather.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Classic grilled cheese sandwich made with cheddar and mozzarella, grilled to golden perfection. Best enjoyed with a hot bowl of tomato soup on rainy days.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken in a creamy tomato sauce, seasoned with spices. This rich, flavorful dish is perfect for warming up on a cold, rainy day.

name: Garlic Naan
description: Freshly baked garlic naan, soft and buttery. A great accompaniment to any meal, especially when paired with curries during rainy weather.

name: Coconut Curry Soup
description: A creamy, mildly spicy coconut curry soup with a blend of vegetables and rice noodles. A comforting bowl of warmth for rainy days.

name: Iced Latte
description: Rich, creamy hot chocolate topped with whipped cream and marshmallows. The ultimate winter comfort drink to enjoy while staying warm indoors.

name: Berry Smoothie
description: Hearty beef chili with beans, tomatoes, and spices. A perfect dish to warm you up during cold winter days. Served with a side of cornbread.

name: Chilled Gazpacho
description: Creamy mac and cheese made with a blend of cheeses and baked until golden and crispy. A satisfying comfort food for cold days.

name: Clam Chowder
description: Creamy New England clam chowder with tender clams and potatoes. A warm and comforting dish to enjoy on a chilly winter day.

name: Shepherd's Pie
description: Traditional shepherdâ€™s pie with seasoned ground beef and vegetables, topped with creamy mashed potatoes. A filling meal for cold weather.

name: French Onion Soup
description: Rich and savory French onion soup with caramelized onions and melted cheese on top of toasted baguette slices. Perfect for cold winter evenings.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
description: Classic chicken pot pie with a buttery crust and creamy filling. Comforting and warm, this dish is perfect for chilly days.

name: https://i.ibb.co.com/S36jRdW/beef.jpg
description: Tender strips of beef in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles. The perfect dish to warm up on a cold evening.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: Warm pumpkin spice latte with cinnamon and nutmeg, topped with whipped cream. Ideal for staying cozy during the cold fall and winter months.

name: Apple Cider
description: Hot apple cider with a hint of cinnamon and cloves. A comforting, warm drink to sip on during cold, breezy evenings.

name: Spicy Ramen
description: A refreshing taco salad with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, seasoned ground beef, cheese, and a zesty dressing. Perfect for enjoying on a hot summer day.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Chilled coffee with milk and sugar, served over ice. The perfect pick-me-up for a hot day when you need something cool and refreshing.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: A refreshing mango smoothie made with fresh mangoes and yogurt. Ideal for cooling down on a hot summer afternoon.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: Grilled chicken wrapped in a soft tortilla with Caesar salad, parmesan, and crispy croutons. A light and cool meal for hot weather.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze. A simple and light salad, perfect for enjoying on a hot summer day.

name: Iced Lemonade
description: Cool and refreshing lemonade, served with ice. The ultimate thirst-quenching drink for a hot summer day. Available in various flavors.

name: Cold Cut
description: A chilled cold cut sandwich with ham, turkey, and cheese, served on a freshly baked roll. A great option for lunch on a hot day.

name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and red onions, topped with olive oil. Perfect for staying cool during hot days.

name: Watermelon Slices
description: Freshly sliced watermelon, chilled to perfection. The ideal snack for staying hydrated and refreshed during the hot summer heat.

name: Chilled Gazpacho
description: Chilled tomato-based gazpacho with cucumbers, peppers, and onions. A refreshing cold soup perfect for cooling down on hot summer days.
